verses.text_plain: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
verses.verse_html: 1The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?

tokens.text: of whom shall I be afraid

verses.text_plain: When the wicked, even mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell.
verses.verse_html:
2When the wicked, even mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell. ▼
▼ came…: Heb. approached against me

footnotes.body_html: ▼ came…: Heb. approached against me

verses.text_plain: Though an host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident.
verses.verse_html: 3Though an host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident.

verses.text_plain: One thing have I desired of the Lord, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the Lord, and to enquire in his temple.
verses.verse_html:
4One thing have I desired of the Lord, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the Lord, and to enquire in his temple. ▼
▼ the beauty: or, the delight

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the beauty: or, the delight

verses.text_plain: For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock.
verses.verse_html: 5For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock.

tokens.text: me; he shall set me up

verses.text_plain: And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
6And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the Lord. ▼
▼ joy: Heb. shouting

verses.text_plain: Hear, O Lord, when I cry with my voice: have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
verses.verse_html: 7Hear, O Lord, when I cry with my voice: have mercy also upon me, and answer me.

verses.text_plain: When thou saidst, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, Lord, will I seek.
verses.verse_html:
8When thou saidst, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, Lord, will I seek. ▼
▼ When…: or, My heart said unto thee, Let my face seek thy face, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ When…: or, My heart said unto thee, Let my face seek thy face, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ When…: or, My heart said unto thee, Let my face seek thy face, etc

verses.text_plain: Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.
verses.verse_html: 9Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.

verses.text_plain: When my father and my mother forsake me, then the Lord will take me up.
verses.verse_html:
10When my father and my mother forsake me, then the Lord will take me up. ▼
▼ take…: Heb. gather me

footnotes.body_html: ▼ take…: Heb. gather me

verses.text_plain: Teach me thy way, O Lord, and lead me in a plain path, because of mine enemies.
verses.verse_html:
11Teach me thy way, O Lord, and lead me in a plain path, because of mine enemies. ▼
▼ a plain…: Heb. a way of plainness
 , ▼
▼ mine…: Heb. those which observe me

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a plain…: Heb. a way of plainness
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a plain…: Heb. a way of plainness

footnotes.body_text: ▼ mine…: Heb. those which observe me
footnotes.body_html: ▼ mine…: Heb. those which observe me

verses.text_plain: Deliver me not over unto the will of mine enemies: for false witnesses are risen up against me, and such as breathe out cruelty.
verses.verse_html: 12Deliver me not over unto the will of mine enemies: for false witnesses are risen up against me, and such as breathe out cruelty.

tokens.text: me not over unto the will
against me, and such as breathe out

verses.text_plain: I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living.
verses.verse_html: 13I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living.

verses.text_plain: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 14Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.
